snippet.title: Mario's Vacation Course 64 RELEASE & DOWNLOAD (SM64 romhack)
snippet.description:
A short 30 star hack made for the competition organized in the SM64 Rom Hacks Discord server. Inspired by Bowser's Fury.
UPDATE: What the trailer says about it not working on PJ64 2.4 is no longer accurate. The latest version works on 2.4.

Download: 
https://romhacking.com/hack/marios-vacation-course
Source code:
https://github.com/Reonu/mvc/

Patch your legally dumped Super Mario 64 US ROM with this tool:
https://hack64.net/tools/patcher.php


Full playthrough of the hack: (Don't watch if you wanna play it by yourself!) https://youtu.be/tVLPyx2WB50
